CustomField.description: Entered when Client has remitted payment for 50% Deposit. Auto Generated via 'Amount Outstanding' field which displays Total Invoice Amount - Payments, which calculates deposit payment amount
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Entered when Client has remitted payment for 50% Deposit. Auto Generated via 'Amount Outstanding' field which displays Total Invoice Amount - Payments, which calculates deposit payment amount
CustomField.label: zDeposit - Amount Paid
